mapper.select: select * from star where email=#{email} and media_id=#{mediaId}
mapper.update: update star set rate=#{rate} where email=#{email} and media_id=#{mediaId}
mapper.select: select * from comment where email=#{email} and media_id=#{mediaId}
mapper.update: update comment set content=#{content},spoiler=#{spoiler} where email=#{email} and media_id=#{mediaId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.*,cl.*,s.* FROM comment c LEFT JOIN comment_like cl ON c.comment_code = cl.comment_code JOIN star s ON c.email = s.email AND c.media_id = s.media_id WHERE c.media_id = #{mediaId};
